attributes.action: To change the law, to make it a hate crime to discriminate nursing Mums
attributes.additional_details:
Breast feeding should be allowed in all public and non public places. It should be protected in law. Surely is deserves to be a protected characteristic that a nursing Mum cannot be discriminated against or harrassed while nursing her child

Please make it a hate crime to carry out such behaviours against nursing Mums
attributes.background: Some still it okay to ban or have removed a nursing Mum feeding her baby. Still others seem to think it is fine to approach a nursing Mum and comment how inappropriate it is. If a nursing Mum is made anxious or upset feeding her baby it can affect her and the baby.

rejection.details:
It's already the case that new mothers are protected against discrimination. You can read more here: 

https://www.citizensadvice.org.uk/law-and-courts/discrimination/what-are-the-different-types-of-discrimination/pregnancy-and-maternity-discrimination/

If you'd like something different, you could start a new petition setting out clearly what you'd like to change.
